comment.author: 18901029@N00
comment._content: This looks something like the church in College St, Drummoyne (See this view in Google Maps.) The band appears to be a brass and reed band - there is a piccolo and clarinet visible in the back two rows at the Powerhouse Museum site.

comment.author: 66458263@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Around Canada Bay, Inner West Sydney, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 66458263@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Sydney's Inner West, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 18901029@N00
comment._content: Also interesting that the drum major and the two players he is looking at (BBb Bass and trombone) at the right are out of step with the rest of the band. Of course the drum major would probably claim that the rest of the band is out of step!
